title: Mysterious Font at Work
author: burgerboy

comments.content: Looks like **[Petita Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=PetitaMedium%20-%20Regular&fid=cd1a1ecc7f4fb10382ee628185851756&fsize=60&text=Date%3A%2022%20Jan%202013&wrap=2)** free font by Manfred Klein
